headline: Cognizant Technology Solutions (NasdaqGS:CTSH) Sees 9% Dip Over Last Quarter Amid Equity Buyback Expansion
summary: Cognizant Technology Solutions (NasdaqGS:CTSH) experienced a 9% decline last quarter, amid challenging market conditions exacerbated by tariff uncertainties and a broad market downturn where the Nasdaq fell sharply. The period saw the appointment of Sailaja Josyula to a leadership role, the launch of an AI solution with ServiceNow, and a significant increase in the company's equity buyback plan. Despite these efforts to bolster shareholder value and innovate, the broader market turmoil,...
